text: Kapena Iye amene poyambirira adapanga zolengedwa ndiponso amene adzatidzutsanso kukhala ndi moyo m’moyo umene uli nkudza ndiponso amene amakupatsani chakudya kuchokera ku nthaka ndi kumwamba? Kodi pali mulungu winanso woonjezera pa Mulungu weniweni? Nena, “Tionetseni chizindikiro chanu ngati zimene mukunenazi ndi zoonadi.”
